title: 107_s1095
content: The Act titled "Veterans' Educational Assistance Restoration Act of 2001" allows certain additional Vietnam Era veterans to be eligible for Montgomery GI Bill benefits. The Veterans' Educational Assistance Restoration Act of 2001 expands eligibility for educational assistance benefits under chapter 34 of title 38, United States Code, for certain Vietnam Era veterans who were not on active duty on October 19, 1984, but reenlisted or reentered active duty after that date. The Veterans' Educational Assistance Restoration Act of 2001 broadens educational benefits eligibility for certain Vietnam Era veterans who reenlisted or reentered active duty after October 19, 1984. Eligibility includes being discharged from active duty for various reasons such as service-connected disability, preexisting medical conditions, hardship, or non-disabling physical or mental conditions. The Veterans' Educational Assistance Restoration Act of 2001 expands educational benefits eligibility for certain Vietnam Era veterans who reenlisted or reentered active duty after October 19, 1984. Eligibility includes being discharged for reasons such as service-connected disability, preexisting medical conditions, hardship, or non-disabling conditions. The Selected Reserve Program eligibility criteria were amended to include veterans who reenlisted or reentered active duty after October 19, 1984, and served at least two years of continuous active duty in the Armed Forces. The eligibility criteria for the Selected Reserve Program were amended to include veterans who served at least two years of continuous active duty in the Armed Forces and then served at least four continuous years in the Selected Reserve. The eligibility criteria for the Selected Reserve Program were amended to include veterans who served at least two years of continuous active duty in the Armed Forces and then served at least four continuous years in the Selected Reserve. Amendments were made to Section 3031 of the title regarding the time for use of entitlement, specifying the date of entitlement for individuals under certain sections.
